content.question: The last three sentences of the passage (“The discussion . . . mind”) suggest that President Masuda

choices.label: worries habitually about his own security
attaches unusual importance to certain aspects of his routine
avoids drawing attention to his Japanese heritage
is more interested in political matters than in social events

content.answer: attaches unusual importance to certain aspects of his routine

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
